value.title: Dynamically remove columns that contain a specific word in the header - Power Query
value.excerpt: It is very common when importing data from excel or pdfs that you get a lot of empty columns. In today's video I will show you how to remove those columns dynamically using power query.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power

value.title: Extract function in Power Query removes all the text? Here is how to fix it.

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.title: Power BI Quick Tip: the Formula Bar in Power Query
value.excerpt: Often you do the transformation in Power Query using the graphical interface, but having the formula bar visible, makes it much easier to understand or change the transformations.
